attributes.action: Amnesty to ALL illegal migrants in the UK
attributes.background: There are many illegal migrants who want to regularise their immigration status so they can help the UK economy. These people are free from criminal convictions and civil injunctions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you want an amnesty for all illegal immigrants, or only for people with no criminal convictions or civil injunctions. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/218729

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
